other_tests.findings: Deletion of 30,431 bp extending from the intronic region between exons XL and A/B to intron 5.
The same mutation was demonstrated in the patientâ€™s mother, indicating that she had this mutation in a mosaic manner.
Revealed calcifications containing newly formed bone.
A SNP within the deleted region showed a relative difference indicating the mother carried the deletion in a mosaic manner.
Approximately 60% of the tested leukocyte DNA had the normal genotype, and approximately 40% had the intragenic deletion.
